channel.title: Comments on: Blog believers support local music
channel.description: Won't you join me for a crazy crazy China adventure?

item.title: by: Amy Bugg
item.description: Ryan, Elenore, Ben, Nate W., and I are all going, but it's at the EARL, not the Echo Lounge (in case you need to let anybody know). =)
item.content:encoded: Ryan, Elenore, Ben, Nate W., and I are all going, but it’s at the EARL, not the Echo Lounge (in case you need to let anybody know). =)
